snippet.title: Adam - Lost Memories Trailer
snippet.description:
The game is available here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/11...
https://adam-lost-memories.itch.io/game

Adam - Lost Memories is a psychological horror game, based on my personal experiences with child abuse.
I created this game because I wanted to show people how it feels to be a child who grew up in a family that's falling apart.

You play as a mentally ill person who suffers from panic disorders.

You play as me...


https://www.facebook.com/adamdubigames
https://twitter.com/adamdubigames
https://www.artstation.com/adamdubigames
https://www.reddit.com/r/AdamDubi_Games/
